verbs.description: phoenix [V: is] listed as a hotspot for kids not getting vaccines phoenix is one of 15 cities listed in a new study that found an increase in the number of kids not vaccinated creating hotspots for diseases centers for disease control and prevention phoenix baylor college of medicine measles nmes emory university melissa nolan peter hotez pertussis
